channel.title: Networking Content Delivery on Indalit Cloud Consulting
channel.description: Recent content in Networking Content Delivery on Indalit Cloud Consulting

item.title: AWS CloudFront Migration to HTTPS with Errors
item.description: I need to start this by saying there is NO bug with AWS CloudFront, NO bug with AWS S3, NO bug with Hugo and NO bug with OWL Carousel javascript. This is a Veronique bug. I just wanted to document this in case someone has a similar problem. I was unable to find the solution on the internet with the search strings I used. Environment Hugo Static Website Generator version v0.

item.title: AWS VPC To Span Across AZs
item.description: Did you know that a subnet cannot span multiple AWS Availability Zones while a VPC can?

item.title: AWS Cross Region VPC Peering
item.description: Did you know AWS now allows VPC Peering across different regions?

item.title: AWS Lightsail Launches Load Balancing Support
item.description: Did you know Amazon Lightsail has added support for Load Balancers with integrated certificate management?
